name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff infused with the power of the elemental forces.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate carvings representing the four elements: fire, water, air, and earth. At the top of the staff, a crystal orb shines with a swirling mix of the elemental energies.

special_effects.elemental_strike: Attacks have a chance to unleash a powerful elemental strike, dealing additional damage of a random element.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of all elemental forces.
looks: The staff is made of a twisted wooden branch with glowing gemstones embedded in its surface. Each gemstone represents a different element.

special_effects.elemental_wrath: Each spell cast with this staff has a chance to trigger a powerful elemental explosion.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that can harness the power of the elements.
looks: The staff is made of polished mahogany wood and has intricate carvings of elemental symbols along its length. It glows with a soft, pulsating light that corresponds to the element being channeled.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 25%.

special_effects.elemental_shield: Provides elemental resistance against attacks of the corresponding element.

name: Shortsword
description: A small, lightweight sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The shortsword has a short, straight blade made of polished steel. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

name: Rusty Dagger
looks: The dagger has a worn and chipped blade with a rusty hilt.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate engravings representing the elements. At the top of the staff, there are four crystals, each representing one of the elements: fire, water, air, and earth.

special_effects.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 50%.
special_effects.elemental_burst: Has a chance to release a burst of elemental energy upon successful hit.
